10 (0) REM TEST FOR PRECISION OPTION
100 (1) PRINT "VALUES WITH PRECISION 7"
110 (1) OPTION PRECISION 7
120 (1) GOSUB 900
130 (1) PRINT "VALUES WITH PRECISION 16"
140 (1) OPTION PRECISION 16
150 (1) GOSUB 900
160 (1) PRINT "VALUES WITH PRECISION INFINITE"
170 (1) OPTION PRECISION "INFINITE"
180 (1) GOSUB 900
200 (1) PRINT "VALUES WITH PRECISION 16"

220 (1) GOSUB 900
230 (1) PRINT "VALUES WITH PRECISION 7"
240 (1) OPTION PRECISION
250 (1) GOSUB 900
899 (1) STOP
900 (0) REM SUBROUTINE PRINT
920 G(920) (5) LET A = 1 / 7
930 G(920) F(I:930) (5) FOR I = 1 TO 12
940 G(920) F(I:930) (60) PRINT A
950 G(920) F(I:930) (60) LET A = A / 10
960 G(920) F(I:930) (60) NEXT I
990 G(920) (5) RETURN
999 (0) END
